website_summaries.verdict: A good option for having a high-quality 3.5mm microphone at home for a budget price.
pros: Small microphone fits well into tight spaces such as on a desktop
Condenser mic can pickup several people using it at the same time in front
Comes with a small, adjustable stand
cons: Sound quality is not good enough for recording acoustic instruments faithfully

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great mix for making YouTube videos. The quality is fairly good. I would buy this for internet streaming only.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a podcaster and this is the perfect mic to record. This budget microphone is well suited for the price point and it meets my gaming needs. My previous microphone started to deteriorate, so this replacement resolved all the sound issues that I had. I absolutely love this microphone! The sound quality is great. I can't believe it cost me so little. I'd definitely recommend this microphone!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: strong volcal performance
customer_reviews.text: even put it a little bit distance, it still catch my voice clearly throught conference. the stand can beadjust higher as well.
customer_reviews.author: Namy W.

customer_reviews.title: Microphone
customer_reviews.text: The recording quality of this microphone is very good,I personally feel very satisfied, and I like small it is.
customer_reviews.author: max wil

customer_reviews.title: I got my microphone, yeah
customer_reviews.text: Though a lil bit bigger than I expected, but still very functional, and I love it
customer_reviews.author: ZC

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: With no user error you can set this up in seconds, it took myself about 15 mins once I realized I didnt need the adapter for my pc. It sounds really good for my stream and just talking to friends good mic for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis Legrange

customer_reviews.title: Got it for the XLR!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I got this mic on sale so it cost me around $20. For this price, this is unbeatable because: 1. it provides pretty good quality audio. If you're stressed about noise, you can always reduce the gain. 2. the XLR cable is really good quality, it was not something I expected! 3. the mic muff and stand both are pretty study. 4. it is plug n play depending on how you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Riz

customer_reviews.title: Mic does NOT work on any device UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Got this mic today, my computer doesn't recognize any mic is plugged in other than my internal mic, my phone as well does not recognize any device has been plugged in, no product support other than outdated booklet includedin box, havent heard from the seller at all yet. Audio still does not work on PC, phone now works but with a specific recording app only. does not pick up loud sounds at all. meant for voice use only
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It did not work on my mac nor did it work plugging into my iphone. The sound was not good. I even had an audio software and it wouldn't work on there. Waste of my money. I had to do deep research and finally found a cheaper mic that worked super well!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: ready for Crisp recording
customer_reviews.text: This mic captures crisp, clear vocals and this features a good sturdy stand. I use this to stream, record, and communicate. This does not subject your teammates to muddy audio. This definitively enhances my performance and delivers exceptional quality audio every time your mic is live. This features sleek aesthetics, adjustable desktop stand.And it boils down to easy USB plug & play setup.
customer_reviews.author: DC977

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I am using this microphone for live broadcasting over the Zoom app over the internet. I primarily use it for myself speaking and lecturing. I am very pleased with the sound quality when I speak. I tried the mic cover that was included, but did not need it, so removed it. The mic picks up my voice very nicely and clearly. There are no problems, no issues. It was plug and play and I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kenasam

customer_reviews.title: Supppose to be Plug & Play, but I couldn't get it to work
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in Microphone and it did not work. Tried everything. Then took it to a computer repair shop , along with my laptop computer. They looked at it for about 2 hours, and tried to get it to work, and could not get it to work. Finally told me that they believed it needs a "power source." So, that's where I am at. I'd hate to buy a "power source" if there's another way. I could use any advice or input that readers have for me. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with iPad Pro 11 / Customer support available only by email
customer_reviews.text: There is no adapter in this kit for the iPad Pro 11 unless something was missing in my shipment. I attempted to use on my iPad 10. It plugged into the available port but I could no longer hear others and they could not hear me. Because there was no contact number for customer support, I emailed them about 24 hours ago and have yet to receive any response. All things considered, I don’t suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: shari

customer_reviews.title: This mic didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I could not get any output out of this microphone using the provided XLR to 3.5 cable. I tried connecting to different devices that accept 3.5mm input and work just fine with other audio output devices I own, but I get nothing from this mic. Then I started thinking, how is a condenser mic with an on/off switch going to work without any power source? There is no place for a battery, and no power is being provided to it over the 3.5mm audio cable. So how is it powered? Maybe I got a bad one, but I'm returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brock S. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, used to record music
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a friend and he produces beats on a computer while also recording songs. The quality of the microphone is very very surprising and works really well with the system he uses. If you’re lookin for a affordable microphone set this is the one. Wires don’t ware out fast and the cover for the microphone easily comes on and off
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dildy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much from a mic at this price, but damn. It really is a excellent mic for sure. Gets rid of a lot of background noise, even in a open room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality of a 300.00 microphone!
customer_reviews.text: This microphone has the sound quality of a multi- hundred dollar mic! I use this microphone to record the sound of my Lego engines to post on YouTube! The Lego engines sound just like real engines with this mic! It covers the complete sound spectrum! Great product for a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Symons

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: No compatible w new windows or OS unless having to install outside software or jump through some ridiculous hoops to change your como hardware. Naahhhhh
customer_reviews.author: Streetsweeper

customer_reviews.title: use for pc phone ipad
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient portable microphone. Can be used on computer ipad and mobile phone. Round hole plug is better than usb. Usb can only be used on the computer. The bottom bracket is also designed very well. The old version of iphone can be inserted directly, the new version of iphone If you have a youtube show, then this microphone is a good choice, you can plug it into your computer when you are at home, and you can plug it in your mobile phone when you go live.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have been really enjoying this microphone lately. I normally use the one that is part of my headsets, but it was never really that clear. This one sounded alot cleaner and does not have alot of my breath sounds as the other one is so close. It is a super easy setup, just plug in the cable and that is it. It has a volume adjustment so that makes it really easy. I am really going to enjoy using this while makes videos and doing live casts.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Nice recording mic
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I do videos for my channel and I need to be able to have good sound while recording at my webcam. This mic was a good price and easy to use. The sound quality was good and I like how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: The meditations

customer_reviews.title: its good (and no, this is not a fake amazon review, deadass)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mic for a podcast I was gonna do for missing people and unsolved mysteries and it really helps take the backround noise out and it really just makes my voice clear. its also good for asmr in my opinion so I sometimes joke around and do that occasionally lmao. overall its a good mic and I think anyone who is reading this should by it. the one thing I do not like about this mic is that the cord is super long so I end up wrapping it around the mic and it sometimes randomly unwraps but other than that this is a good mic.
customer_reviews.author: christina ogunjemilua

customer_reviews.title: This microphone not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely does not work. I bought a smaller lav mic and it works great. This product is. Waste.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great microphone, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this Mic takes it home with simplicity and quality. Let me explain how. First the build of this Mic is impressive. Being nearly all metal it has a great weight to it, keeping it mostly bottom heavy which keeps it stabilized. So if you knock the table or shake it it won't just topple over. Also it probably wont just break on you. This mic is incredible for the price range! I've made a video review to show my thoughts!
customer_reviews.author: Terran Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: good quality of voice
customer_reviews.text: I was super surprise this mic perfectly fit my table. according my friends words, the qualoty of my voice are great. I am thinking to record a song or two in the future. they should be great.
customer_reviews.author: Haobin Liu

customer_reviews.title: Died after two months use.
customer_reviews.text: While the mic worked the sound quality was amazing! But it died after two months use and we can’t get it working again and have to buy a different mic.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is Good, The Value is Great
customer_reviews.text: This performs quite well and is on par with something of a higher tier. The price and ease of use of this mic makes it a must have for people who need a decent mic to get the job done. I don't believe you can get a better value for a microphone. The 3.5mm jack is nice to see these days instead of a USB connector on all the Blue Yeti mics. It has a hardware off switch and is easily unplugged and moved.
customer_reviews.author: George Simon

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I hadto go into settings, go to microphone, then go to troubleshooting, and then it took me 3 minutes for it to actually connect to my iPad. Then we I was testing it out in the app “Voice Memos” which is made by apple so it’s not the app’s fault, it just would not detect my voice. The microphone is trash, don’t waste your money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: High-quality microphone for voice recording
customer_reviews.text: I like the sensitivity of the microphone. I edited the video, used this microphone to record my voice. It turned out qualitatively.
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works good you can hook it up to a phone I have a iPhone I hook it up with the head phone jack for iPhone. Love it I can use it to sing and all kind of things

customer_reviews.title: If the viewers can't hear you... BUY THIS NOW!

customer_reviews.text: I love this mic for gaming/ streaming great Noise canceling great sound quality sounds best when close to mouth

customer_reviews.title: It's giving me problems
customer_reviews.text: I have plugged this into my computer. Several zoom or messenger calls I have had to get on a different device to continue the call so people can hear me. This microphone just quits. One minute it works and the next it don't. I don't know what the problem is.

customer_reviews.title: Just a prop
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get it to work. I think that it’s a toy or prop. Has no power or indicators of power.

customer_reviews.title: Get something better.
customer_reviews.text: The mic is getting alot of white noise even though im home alone and where i live is quite, and you can hear the white noise in the recording. other mic don't do this. also the dual cable doesn't really work, on the dual jack where it says mic doesn't work I have to use the head part. chid this product doesn't pass vibe the vibe check. NOT A VIBE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Salazar

customer_reviews.title: the effect is not bad.
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and the quality is very good. I was able to start using this microphone in Seconds after opening. Not bad at all from the price to the soft and clear sound perfect for me. It also looks so pro in my live stream events. The sound is very clear, sometimes it will be used to record when recording video, the effect is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: dana hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beginner setup
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mic for Youtube vids + Zoom and Skype meetings and my sound is definitely improved. There are higher quality mics that cancel background noise better and likely provide higher quality sound - but for the price this mic is pretty great. (For Mac users you will need a USB sound card as well)
customer_reviews.author: Master Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice good audio quality that whenever i am using it to chat with my girlfriend and friends it brings out to be the best sound effect with reduced background noise. It looks allegant in its design and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this item

customer_reviews.text: The stand is cheesy and a leg was broken. I

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!

customer_reviews.title: Great value microphone for its price and it is great for vlog and voice recoding.
customer_reviews.text: Great microphone for its price and great for vlog and voice recoding. It has its own voice volume input adjuster knob. The stand is retractable and rugged. The recording quality is good and it pick up my voice pretty well.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Best recording tool

customer_reviews.title: It destroyed my phone battery - but it works well.
customer_reviews.text: Started out fine, eventually destroyed my phone battery. I would not recommend for use with a cell phone. It sounds good though and works well, easy to setup and use. My phone was a Motorola e5 Supra for reference.

product_meta.title: PC Microphone, ELEGIANT Y20 Portable Condenser Microphone 3.5mm Plug & Play with Tripod Stand Home Studio Recording Microphone for Computer, Smartphone, iPad, Podcasting Karaoke, YouTube, Skype, Games
product_meta.description: Technical Data Microphone Unit Omni-directional microphone 9765 condenser Frequency Response 50 Hz - 16 kHz Sensitivity -32 dB 2 dB Impedance ≤ 2 2 KΩ SNR ≥36dB Cable Length 5 9ft (3 5plug) Note 1 special design for chatting over MSN Skype and singing over internet 2 3 5stero Male fits best on all types of PC Noisy Rooms 3 high-quality microphone a perfect voice recorder system 4 The set with the help of stand and clip 5 High-Performance Microphone captures just sound 6 plug in and Start mounting systems - No extra gear needed 7 foldable tabletop microphone stand you can make these to the microphone angle is free Package Included： 1 x Condenser Microphone 1 x 3 5mm Audio Cable 1 x Tripod Stand 1 x 3 5mm Headphone Mic adapter 1 x User manual
feature_bullets: ♫【Professional Condenser Microphone】Capture rich full-bodied sound from sources that are directly in front of the mic 100% restore your voice without any distortion enjoy original voice and giving you the superior sound possible out of your vocal performances

♫【Plug and Play】Simply plug the 3 5mm audio cable to your phones desktop computer laptop notebook Driver-free works with any software Superior clarity with the simplicity of a single plug-&-play connection
♫【Folding Tripod Stand】Ultra-compact design for maximum portability you can fix the microphone on the desk with the mini flexible head 360°rotation adjust the direction and height of the microphone

♫【Noise Cancellation】The ability to receive sound from different angles and to fully incorporate the sound of the whole environment Noise cancellation and isolates the main sound source This mic is really great at picking up vocals and leaving background noise out of the recorded audio

♫【Perfect for Vocals】Brand new design and high quality mic Ideal for Professional Studio Broadcasting Podcasting Interviews Voice Recording Video Conference Singing over Internet Online Chatting such as Facebook MSN Skype and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars304 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
